ygData.subject: Re: The Bot in Charge
ygData.msgSnippet: ... She heard him and understood what he was going through. This wasn t what she wanted to do either.  She wanted to spend time with her beloved Lunarpine. But

::Shadow Wing:;

She heard him and understood what he was going through. This wasn't 
what she wanted to do either.  She wanted to spend time with her 
beloved Lunarpine. But this was something that needed to be done 
first.   She looked at RebelYell,"Don't worry, when we are done with 
the repairs, then we can take a little time off. And all the 
maintencance bots were destroyed already."  She turned and looked at 
Lunarpine and smiled at him.  She blew him a kiss and went back to 
welding the plates on the side of the hull. 

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Terry Barlow <twb176@y...> wrote:
> ::RebelYell::
> RebelYell grumbled to himself as he worked. This is
> not the kind of work he enjoyed. "I'm a soldier, not a
> slaggin' maintenance bot!" he thought. Still, he
> admitted this ship had taken quite a beating, and if
> repairs werent done soon theres no way it would hold
> up under fire. So RebelYell decided to keep his
> complaints to himself. And besides, after this, he
> would kill some Preds one way or the other, even if he
> had to go look for the Pred base himself.
